Megastorm:
     As the shots were fired at him he transformed into robot mode, bringing his huge arms to cover his head and chest, he flew back ten feet from the blast, and when he checked himself he realized he would need aq CR chamber. All of his weapons mounted on his arms were useless. 
     Enraged, he brought his gun and pointed it at Tyrael, just as Megastorm was about to fire he saw the bot transform, and then fully realized who he was fighting. He backed off a bit and sent a comm to Tyrael.
     "I am sorry, Tyrael," He started, as an agent of Tripredacus he had of course heard of Tyrael. "I didn't realize who you were."
     Then he opened a comm to Galvatron, "My apologizes, I didn't realize you were fighting Tyrael. This is something I cannot do."
     He closed the comm to Galvatron, and went back to Tyrael, "What can I do to help you?"
 warriorazure wrote:Tyrael managed to take flight and thus avoiding some of the major 
shots. Seeing another shot coming from a large tank that had just 
arrived, he rises higher and avoids the large blast that could have 
blown him down. The smaller shots however did get to him, and his leg 
was getting weak. He wouldn't be able to use that talon for some 
times.

He saw that Skulletron was trying to coordinate with Wolfenstein, and 
the tank's arrival made things more complicated. A plan formed in his 
head.

He directed two turrets to concentrate fire on the new bot and follow 
it. They both unleashed a hellfire of laser beams at him.

Tyrael: Khan Vlad! Forward and do not stop! We drive them back now!

Vlad: Are you certain, Major?

The Clanner looked around. The brunt of the enemy opposition was 
situated on a northeastern frontline from the base. Inferno and 
Quickstrike were near, but the base defenses could handle the pair.

Vlad: I see... (He turned to Inferno) I withdraw my claim on you as my 
opponent. Forward Tyrael!

He turned to Wolfenstein, transformed then used his medium laser on 
the hairy bot.

At the same moment, Tyrael let go another volley of needles on 
Skulletron, dived down and slashed twice at him with his razor-sharp 
feathers.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Eric Bischoff" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> : : Skulletron : :
> 
> Skulletron nods, then he points to Tyrael.
> 
> Skulletron:  That's the bot in charge of the Tripreds.  I need you 
to go and take his attention, but try not to get hurt.  And please, 
try to resist aggression, or else this will be harder for me.  Can you 
do that, comrade?

<P>Megastorm:
<P>     As the shots were fired at him he transformed into robot mode, bringing his huge arms to cover his head and chest, he flew back ten feet from the blast, and when he checked himself he realized he would need aq CR chamber. All of his weapons mounted on his arms were useless. 
<P>     Enraged, he brought his gun and pointed it at Tyrael, just as Megastorm was about to fire he saw the bot transform, and then fully realized who he was fighting. He backed off a bit and sent a comm to Tyrael.
<P>     "I am sorry, Tyrael," He started, as an agent of Tripredacus he had of course heard of Tyrael. "I didn't realize who you were."
<P>     Then he opened a comm to Galvatron, "My apologizes, I didn't realize you were fighting Tyrael. This is something I cannot do."
<P>     He closed the comm to Galvatron, and went back to Tyrael, "What can I do to help you?"
